name: Classic Tomato Soup
description: A creamy and comforting tomato soup, perfect for a rainy day.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add tomatoes and broth, simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend until smooth.
Stir in cream and basil before serving.

name: Simple Lemon Herb Chicken
description: Juicy and flavorful chicken breast marinated in lemon and herbs.
instructions: Marinate chicken with lemon juice, herbs, and olive oil.
Sear in a hot pan until golden brown.
Finish baking in the oven at 200°C for 15-20 minutes.

name: Quick Garlic Noodles
description: A fast and addictive garlic noodle dish that's ready in minutes.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add cooked spaghetti, soy sauce, and Parmesan cheese, tossing to combine.
Garnish with parsley.

name: Avocado Toast with Egg
description: The perfect breakfast or light lunch, featuring creamy avocado and a perfectly fried egg.
instructions: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast.
Fry an egg and place it on top.
Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic, chewy, and gooey chocolate chip cookies that everyone will love.
instructions: Cream together butter and sugars.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
In a separate bowl, combine dry ingredients.
Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet ingredients.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Bake at 190°C for 10-12 minutes.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A simple and elegant Italian salad with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Arrange alternating slices on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves in between.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

name: One-Pan Lemon Pasta
description: A bright and zesty pasta dish that cooks entirely in one pan for easy cleanup.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large pan.
Bring to a boil, then simmer, stirring occasionally.
Cook until pasta is al dente and sauce has thickened.

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
description: A thick and creamy smoothie bowl topped with fresh berries and granola.
instructions: Blend frozen berries, banana, and a splash of almond milk until thick and smooth.
Pour into a bowl.
Top with granola and fresh berries.

name: Cheesy Quesadilla
description: A quick and satisfying quesadilla, loaded with melted cheese and your favorite fillings.
instructions: Place a tortilla in a dry pan over medium heat.
Sprinkle cheese and fillings on one half.
Fold the other half over and cook until golden brown and cheese is melted, flipping once.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Roman pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta until crisp.
Whisk eggs and cheese together.
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water.
Quickly toss pasta with egg mixture, pancetta, and a splash of pasta water off the heat.
Serve with lots of black pepper.

name: Banana Bread
description: A moist and delicious banana bread, perfect for using up overripe bananas.
instructions: Mash bananas.
Mix in melted butter, sugar, and egg.
Whisk in flour and baking soda.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake at 175°C for about an hour.

name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Chop all vegetables and add to a large bowl.
Crumble feta cheese over the top.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice and toss to combine.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: A simple yet flavorful pasta dish tossed in a vibrant basil pesto sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Drain, reserving a small amount of pasta water.
Toss the hot pasta with pesto, adding a little pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Stir in halved cherry tomatoes and top with Parmesan.

name: French Toast
description: Classic French toast with a custardy center and golden-brown crust.
instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, and cinnamon.
Dip bread slices into the egg mixture.
Cook in a buttered pan over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with maple syrup.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy and decadent chicken alfredo pasta that's pure comfort food.
instructions: Cook fettuccine.
Season and cook chicken breast, then slice.
In a saucepan, melt butter and cook garlic.
Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan until sauce is smooth.
Toss with pasta and top with chicken.

name: Oatmeal Energy Balls
description: No-bake energy balls that are perfect for a quick and healthy snack.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Mix well.
Roll into bite-sized balls.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Classic ground beef tacos, seasoned to perfection and served in crispy shells.
instructions: Brown the ground beef in a skillet; drain fat.
Stir in taco seasoning and a little water; simmer.
Warm the taco shells.
Assemble tacos with beef and your favorite toppings.

name: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy, golden pancakes made from scratch, ready for your favorite toppings.
instructions: Whisk together dry ingredients.
In a separate bowl, whisk together milk and egg, then stir in melted butter.
Pour wet ingredients into dry and mix until just combined.
Cook on a hot, greased griddle until bubbles form, then flip.

name: Black Bean Burgers
description: Hearty and flavorful vegetarian burgers made from black beans and spices.
instructions: Mash black beans in a bowl.
Mix in breadcrumbs, finely chopped onion, garlic, and spices.
Form into patties.
Cook in a lightly oiled pan for 5 minutes per side.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: A classic Thai dessert with sweet sticky rice, fresh mango, and a coconut sauce.
instructions: Soak and steam the sticky rice.
While it's steaming, heat coconut milk, sugar, and salt in a saucepan until dissolved.
Pour half the coconut mixture over the hot cooked rice and let it absorb.
Serve the sweet rice with fresh mango slices and the remaining coconut sauce.

name: Cottage Cheese Toast
description: A high-protein and customizable toast that's creamy and delicious.
instructions: Toast the bread.
Spread a thick layer of cottage cheese on top.
Drizzle with honey and top with fresh berries.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: A quick and elegant pasta dish with shrimp in a garlic, white wine, and butter sauce.
instructions: Cook linguine.
In a large skillet, melt butter and cook garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Deglaze the pan with white wine and lemon juice.
Toss with cooked pasta and garnish with parsley.

name: Baked Feta Soup
description: A creamy, tangy soup inspired by the viral baked feta pasta.
instructions: In a baking dish, place the block of feta in the center, surrounded by tomatoes, onion, and garlic.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake at 200°C for 25 minutes.
Transfer the baked ingredients to a pot, add vegetable broth, and blend until smooth.

name: Mug Brownie
description: A single-serving brownie made in a mug in the microwave in just a few minutes.
instructions: In a mug, mix together the dry ingredients.
Stir in the milk and oil until you have a smooth batter.
Add a few chocolate chips.
Microwave on high for 60-90 seconds.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: A classic takeout favorite that's easy to make at home with leftover rice.
instructions: Scramble eggs in a hot wok or skillet and set aside.
Add a bit more oil and stir-fry the peas and carrots.
Add the rice, breaking it up.
Stir in soy sauce, sesame oil, and the scrambled eggs.
Mix in chopped scallions before serving.

name: The Viral Feta Pasta
description: The incredibly popular and easy TikTok recipe where you bake a block of feta with cherry tomatoes to create a creamy, tangy pasta sauce.
instructions: Place feta in the center of a baking dish, surround with tomatoes and garlic.
Drizzle generously with olive oil and season.
Bake at 200°C for 30 minutes until tomatoes burst and feta is soft.
Meanwhile, cook pasta.
Mash the feta and tomatoes to create a sauce, toss with pasta and fresh basil.

name: Cloud Bread
description: A fluffy, meringue-like 'bread' made with just three ingredients. A fun and visually stunning low-carb treat.
instructions: Whip egg whites until foamy.
Gradually add sugar and cornstarch, continuing to whip until stiff, glossy peaks form.
If using, fold in food coloring.
Scoop the meringue into a dome shape on a baking sheet.
Bake at 150°C for 25 minutes.

name: Dalgona Coffee (Whipped Coffee)
description: The coffee craze that swept the internet. A velvety, whipped coffee topping served over milk.
instructions: In a bowl, combine equal parts instant coffee, sugar, and hot water (e.g., 2 tablespoons of each).
Whip with a hand mixer or by hand until it's light, airy, and forms soft peaks.
Fill a glass with milk and ice.
Spoon the whipped coffee mixture on top.

name: Mini Pancake Cereal
description: A playful breakfast trend where you make tiny, dime-sized pancakes and serve them in a bowl with milk and syrup, just like cereal.
instructions: Prepare your favorite pancake batter.
Pour the batter into a squeeze bottle or a piping bag.
On a hot, greased non-stick skillet, squeeze out tiny dots of batter.
Cook for about a minute until bubbles form, then flip and cook for another 30 seconds.
Serve in a bowl with butter, syrup, and milk.

name: Gigi Hadid's Spicy Vodka Pasta
description: A creamy, spicy, and delicious pasta sauce made famous by Gigi Hadid. The vodka helps to balance the richness of the cream.
instructions: Cook pasta.
In a large saucepan, sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add tomato paste and cook until darkened.
Stir in vodka and cook it off, then add heavy cream and red pepper flakes.
Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Stir in butter and Parmesan cheese, then add the cooked pasta and a splash of pasta water.
